title.value: Влияние элементов технологии на продуктивность гибридов сахарной свеклы
Effect of technology elements on productivity of sugar beet hybrids

journal.title: Arable Farming and Breeding in Belarus : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Lukyanyuk, N.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming.  Experimental Scientific Station on Sugar Beet

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the influence of separate elements of sugar beet (Beta vulgaris var. saccharifera) technology on productivity of hybrids with different level of resistance to pathogen complex. The field experiment was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus on the trial field of the Gorodeya Sugar Factory in 2008, on the experimental field of the Experimental Scientific Station on Sugar Beet in 2010-2011 on sod-podzolic loamy sand soil. As a result of realized research it was revealed that additional nitrogen application at top dressing N30 in the phase of 2-3 pairs of leaves was unreasonable. Productivity growth in the studied hybrids was not established. The trend of productivity growth after the application of fertilizer composition Polycom 'Sugar Beet' was determined. Fungicide application during cercosporosis epiphytoty was proved on hybrids with different level of stability. The agrochemical indices of arable horizon of soil in 2008, 2010 and 2011 were presented. The influence of intensification on sugar beet productivity (average in 2008, 2010-2011) was shown.
